description:
The reason for Kodaki’s strange behavior remains unclear, but her family background and an “incident” that occurred in the past between her and the Pretty Boy Detective Club becomes apparent. Nagahiro finally decides to break his engagement with Kodaki. What will be the fate between the girl known as the devil and the Pretty Boy Detective Club?
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Oshie to Tabi Suru Bishounen: Sono 2
The Pretty Boy Traveling with the Brocade Portrait (Part 2)
押絵と旅する美少年 その2
